Text: Any chance of Justice League Unlimited coming soon?

xenoFLASH: yeah, I'm sorry for the delay. I've just had no uninterrupted time for the last few weeks (and it's 39 eps where I have to match subs, so I need time without distractions, unlike movie encodes; I try not to release anything without subs).

I appreciate that you're waiting - really! - and I think they'll be worth the wait. But I can't give you date right now. I'm about 1/5 of the way thru the 39 eps.

Again, sorry - I didn't think they'd take *quite* so long...
Time means nothing. You have a level of quality that you wish to hold. Nothing wrong with waiting. Keep it up.

Hey Tr108

Admire your work, glad to hear your working on JLU

Looking forward to see it when your ready :) ,  glad to see you take the quality of your work seriously

Kind Regards
Thank you Zeruel. I'm getting time to do a few eps every other day or so. About 1/2 way thru. :)

Hey  again Tr108 , thanks for the update and quick reply , thats very much appriciated.

Kind Regards
Love this movie thanks for the upload.  Any chance you will be doing the 1987 animated film G.I. Joe: The Movie?
Tiestick2003 - funny you should ask, I've been trying to get my hands on the GI: The Movie BD for a while. If I ever do, I'll def throw it up. :)
